item.title: Adding the correct Telekinetic Grab spell - Fixes Dupe
item.dc:creator: @XMikEIX XMikEIX
item.description:
@XMikEIX wrote:

[quote=“ytuio9, post:40, topic:328225”][quote author=Ryan4965 link=topic=424612.msg3146982#msg3146982 date=1268170255]

Which switch statement is this for, I’m confused xD

wtf??

Wow, you have no clue?

If you have cases, you gotta have a switch statement that relates to the cases.

lmao yes but he gave you the case ID with the comment after it, i’m sure you’ll probably find that once (or twice) in the whole file…[/quote]

Sigh
You just don[quote author=lord killord link=topic=424612.msg3151264#msg3151264 date=1268553726]
oh noes, ur code just makes me dc when I use it -.-
[/quot[quote author=Encryption link=topic=424612.msg3149851#msg3149851 date=1268439100]
Very nice.
[/quot[quote author=DeathWingz link=topic=424612.msg3147610#msg3147610 date=1268241028]
Thanks for this it worked.
[/quot[quote author=ytuio9 link=topic=424612.msg3147609#msg3147609 date=1268240578]

[quote=“Ryan4965, post:36, topic:328225”][quote author=ytuio9 link=topic=424612.msg3146865#msg3146865 date=1268159093]

Which switch statement is this for, I’m confused xD

wtf??
[/quote]

Wow, you have no clue?

If you have cases, you gotta have a switch statement that relates to the cases.[/quote]

lmao yes but he gave you the case ID with the comment after it, i’m sure you’ll probably find that once (or twice) in the whole fi[quote author=ytuio9 link=topic=424612.msg3146871#msg3146871 date=1268159611]
lol is this an angry topic or sumthing?
[/quot[quote author=ytuio9 link=topic=424612.msg3146865#msg3146865 date=1268159093]

Ryan4965:

Which switch statement is this for, I’m confused xD

wtf??
[/q[quote author=ytuio9 link=topic=424612.msg3123885#msg3123885 date=1265836128]
in my opinion, it’s great and it helps economy servers that are filled with dupers. of course anybody with an average java coding knowledge can do this but who cares? you just helped the server community. also, the conventions are ok but they could use some work on them.
[/quot[quote author=Oh-Noes link=topic=424612.msg3123826#msg3123826 date=1265830250]

spy man47:

Ffs, didn’t work with me on Delta…

In your client.java, search:

Following started!

You should find case 139, which is:

case 139: followID = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndian(); println("Following started!"); break;

Just add this below it:

[code] case 181: //Using magic on items on the floor
int magicOnItemY = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndian();
int magicOnItemID = inStream.readUnsignedWord();
int magicOnItemX = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndian();
int magicOnItemSpellID = inStream.readUnsignedWordA();
int offsetY3 = (magicOnItemX - absX);
int offsetX3 = (magicOnItemY - absY);

        if (magicOnItemSpellID == 1168) {
			if (playerLevel[6] >= 33) {
			if (!playerHasItem(563, 1) || !playerHasItem(556, 5)) {
				sM("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell.");
			}
			
			if (playerHasItem(563, 1) && playerHasItem(556, 5)) {
				if (ItemHandler.itemExists(magicOnItemID, magicOnItemX, magicOnItemY)) {
					removeGroundItem(magicOnItemX, magicOnItemY, magicOnItemID);
					int itemAmount = ItemHandler.itemAmount(magicOnItemID, magicOnItemX, magicOnItemY);
					ItemHandler.removeItem(magicOnItemID, magicOnItemX, magicOnItemY, itemAmount);
					addItem(magicOnItemID, itemAmount);
					stillgfx(142, absY, absX);
					setAnimation(711);
					toX = absX;
					toY = absY;
					stillgfx(144, magicOnItemY, magicOnItemX);
					resetItems(3214);
					deleteItem(563, 1);
					deleteItem(556, 5);
				} else {
					sM("The Item is either gone, or somebody has already picked it up.");
				}
			}
			} else if (playerLevel[6] <= 32) {
				sM("You need a magic level of 21 to cast this spell.");
			}
		}
        break;[/code]

I know it works, because I ha[quote author=ytuio9 link=topic=424612.msg3146871#msg3146871 date=1268159611]
lol is this an angry topic or sumthing?
[/quot[quote=“ytuio9, post:35, topic:328225”]lol is this an angry topic or sumthing?
[/quot[quote author=DeathWingz link=topic=424612.msg3147610#msg3147610 date=1268241028]
Thanks for this it worked.
[/quot[quote author=XxJtxX link=topic=424612.msg3147130#msg3147130 date=1268178632]
And this is why it’s fun to lurk the “Server Tutorials” Section of MoparScape. Thanks for the luls everyone.
[/quot[quote author=ytuio9 link=topic=424612.msg3123885#msg3123885 date=1265836128]
in my opinion, it’s great and it helps economy servers that are filled with dupers. of course anybody with an average java coding knowledge can do this but who cares? you just helped the server community. also, the conventions are ok but they could use some work on them.
[/quote]e]e]e]e]ve it working perfectly on a Delta source.
[/quote]e]uote]e]le…
[/quote]e]e]e]'t get it.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Adding the correct Telekinetic Grab spell - Fixes Dupe
item.dc:creator: @Oh-Noes Oh-Noes
item.description:
@Oh-Noes wrote:

spy man47:

Ffs, didn’t work with me on Delta…

In your client.java, search:

Following started!

You should find case 139, which is:

case 139: followID = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndian(); println("Following started!"); break;

Just add this below it:

[code] case 181: //Using magic on items on the floor
int magicOnItemY = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndian();
int magicOnItemID = inStream.readUnsignedWord();
int magicOnItemX = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndian();
int magicOnItemSpellID = inStream.readUnsignedWordA();
int offsetY3 = (magicOnItemX - absX);
int offsetX3 = (magicOnItemY - absY);

        if (magicOnItemSpellID == 1168) {
			if (playerLevel[6] >= 33) {
			if (!playerHasItem(563, 1) || !playerHasItem(556, 5)) {
				sM("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell.");
			}
			
			if (playerHasItem(563, 1) && playerHasItem(556, 5)) {
				if (ItemHandler.itemExists(magicOnItemID, magicOnItemX, magicOnItemY)) {
					removeGroundItem(magicOnItemX, magicOnItemY, magicOnItemID);
					int itemAmount = ItemHandler.itemAmount(magicOnItemID, magicOnItemX, magicOnItemY);
					ItemHandler.removeItem(magicOnItemID, magicOnItemX, magicOnItemY, itemAmount);
					addItem(magicOnItemID, itemAmount);
					stillgfx(142, absY, absX);
					setAnimation(711);
					toX = absX;
					toY = absY;
					stillgfx(144, magicOnItemY, magicOnItemX);
					resetItems(3214);
					deleteItem(563, 1);
					deleteItem(556, 5);
				} else {
					sM("The Item is either gone, or somebody has already picked it up.");
				}
			}
			} else if (playerLevel[6] <= 32) {
				sM("You need a magic level of 21 to cast this spell.");
			}
		}
        break;[/code]

I know it works, because I have it working perfectly on a Delta source.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding the correct Telekinetic Grab spell - Fixes Dupe
item.dc:creator: @bob10242 bob10242
item.description:
@bob10242 wrote:

[quote=“Oh-Noes, post:21, topic:328225”][quote author=spy man47 link=topic=424612.msg3121177#msg3121177 date=1265538467]
lol this has to be added in ClickingMost.java not client.java…
[/quote]
ClickingMost.java is primarily for actionbuttons, so no.
Thank you dude!!!
For anyone who can’t figure it out for Delta:

[code] case 181: //Using magic on items on the floor
int magicOnItemY = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndian();
int magicOnItemID = inStream.readUnsignedWord();
int magicOnItemX = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndian();
int magicOnItemSpellID = inStream.readUnsignedWordA();
int offsetY3 = (magicOnItemX - absX);
int offsetX3 = (magicOnItemY - absY);

        if (magicOnItemSpellID == 1168) {
			if (playerLevel[6] >= 33) {
			if (!playerHasItem(563, 1) || !playerHasItem(556, 5)) {
				sM("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell.");
			}
			
			if (playerHasItem(563, 1) && playerHasItem(556, 5)) {
				if (ItemHandler.itemExists(magicOnItemID, magicOnItemX, magicOnItemY)) {
					removeGroundItem(magicOnItemX, magicOnItemY, magicOnItemID);
					int itemAmount = ItemHandler.itemAmount(magicOnItemID, magicOnItemX, magicOnItemY);
					ItemHandler.removeItem(magicOnItemID, magicOnItemX, magicOnItemY, itemAmount);
					addItem(magicOnItemID, itemAmount);
					stillgfx(142, absY, absX);
					setAnimation(711);
					toX = absX;
					toY = absY;
					stillgfx(144, magicOnItemY, magicOnItemX);
					resetItems(3214);
                                            deleteItem(563, 1);
                                            deleteItem(556, 5);
				} else {
					sM("The Item is either gone, or somebody has already picked it up.");
				}
			}
			} else if (playerLevel[6] <= 32) {
				sM("You need a magic level of 21 to cast this spell.");
			}
		}
        break;[/code][/quote]

Read full topic
